extension.description: By default, when subscriber renew his subscription, Membership Pro will create a new subscription record for him. If you enable this plugin, It will just extend subscription end date of the original record without creating records. It might make managing subscribers easier. Please think about it carefully before enable this plugin. Ask me any question about this plugin if needed.
